Title: 40904 - # Ways You Didn’t Know a Smartwatch Could Enhance Your Daily Life
Direction: 675 words. Write 4 to 8 ways a smartwatch enhances daily life by making it easier. The idea sounds a bit cliché', but in practice, the smartwatch frees the user from constantly checking their phone when alerts come through. Modern living means being connected, and being connected means constantly checking the phone for emails, texts, and more. Using a smartwatch means getting alerts at the flick of a wrist and allows the user to check the alert. This simple gesture means the user has the option to respond or not depending on the importance of the message. Consider anchoring the text to a sentence discussing the types of alerts an Apple watch displays. The placement site covers a wide range of topics and also does reviews. So make sure to write for a broad audience.
Anchor Text: apple watch branded variation (client name + keywords)
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: discreet notifications on T-Mobile's Apple Watch

Title: 40905 - # Ways Mobile Gaming Makes the Smart Watch Fun
Direction: 675 words. Write 4 to 8 ways on how mobile games are making the smart watch experience almost the same as the phone. The smart watch has a touch screen that lends itself to gaming without having to pull out the phone. Discuss some of these games, and why they work well on the smart watch. The screen size limits the types of game available on the watch, but everyone likes a time killer. Appeal to those who are interested in gaming, and must have the latest in gadgetry. Consider anchoring the text to a sentence that discusses some of the games available for the Apple watch.
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: gaming on the Apple Watch from T-Mobile

Title: 40906 - # Ways To Rock Your New iPad Pro
Direction: 675 words. List 4-8 ways for a new iPad Pro user to fully enjoy the features of his new device. Stick to uses and applications that are specifically better on an iPad Pro than on a more basic tablet, especially those that take advantage of the Pro's high-speed processor, large screen, light weight, and connectivity. Discuss things like watching movies, playing games, using travel apps, editing photos, or multitasking. Your reader is someone who is interested in tech and has either just purchased an iPad Pro, or is considering one. The anchor text should slip naturally into any paragraph where you discuss features of the iPad Pro.
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: a new Ipad Pro from T-Mobile
